actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to eliminate Federal payments for abortions under the medicaid program except for abortions to prevent the death of the mother.

summary.text: Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to prohibit Federal payments for abortion under such title except when necessary to prevent the death of the mother.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to eliminate Federal payments for abortions under the medicaid program except for abortions to prevent the death of the mother.
